long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Featuring a built in Japanese dictionary with support to hear audio recordings of Japanese words from JDIC as well as the ability to import words in to the flashcard app Anki, this is a port of the old Firefox addon "Rikaisama"
